title: Netherworld Investigator - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cannibalism   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Dark   Detectives   Doctors   Evil Organizations   Genius Protagonist   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Investigations   Male Protagonist   Mind Control   Modern Day   Murders   Mysterious Family Background   Mystery Solving   Organized Crime   Past Plays a Big Role   Poisons   Police   Possession   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Psychopaths   Romantic Subplot   R*pe   Secret Organizations   Serial Killers   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Spirits   Thriller
author: Ninth Daoist   道门老九
description: Beneath the peaceful façade of the modern world, an undercurrent of shocking crimes roils in the underbelly of society. Follow Song Yang, the last Traditional Coroner of China, as he navigates through this underworld of violence and debauchery, and uses seemingly common everyday objects like an umbrella, squid ink, and magnets to hunt down serial killers, sexual predators, real-life vampires, necrophiles, and others who prey upon the innocents and hide behind the fog of supernatural mystery. There is no mystery too enigmatic for Song Yang to solve, and there is no depth too deep for him to venture into to uncover the truth!>
